name: Four Points by Sheraton Destin- Ft Walton Beach

reviews.title: Good Value,safe,clean & friendly
reviews.text: After a bad experience of one night stay in another hotel, we moved to 4 points. Our stay was 10 days. The staff on many occasions recommended days trips to us and fabulous places to eat.

This was a great hotel experience. The location is perfect with the breach access and the location to all the resturants/bars in the area. The hotel also has a great pool are and bar. Highly recommend!
reviews.title: Great hotel
The best!!
reviews.text: Every year when we go to FWB we stay at here! We even got married on the beach in FWB and had all of our family and friends stay here, they all loved it. The grounds are so beautiful we had our pictures taken there. The breakfast is great especially since it's "free". All of the staff is very friendly and ready to help if needed. I absolutely recommend this hotel!!!

reviews.title: 1st Class all the way!
reviews.text: We are getting married in the ft walton/destin area this summer and decided to take a trip to check out the hotels & dining establishments. We stayed at the sheraton march 9-11 and loved it, even with the heavy construction present starting daily @ 8am. The manager Keith was very personable and eager to make our stay pleasant. He showed us the honeymoon suite which was a beautiful top floor room with a jacuzzi tub. This place was lovely and we are looking forward to spending our wedding night here this summer! Highly recommended, terrific service & worth every penny!

We take a family vacation every year to Fort Walton, and we have stayed at the Four Points the last three years. The location is great (right on the beach) and price is good. I'm interested to see the updates taking place, as the age of the hotel rooms was one of the minor negatives. The breakfast buffet is average and not worth the price if you don't have it included in the cost of the room already. The hotel is very kid friendly as well and has activities for the children planned the entire week. The staff are by far the best I have experienced at a hotel in a while.
reviews.title: Stay here every year
Terrific potential
reviews.text: I stayed 1 night on 2/7/05. There is heavy remodeling going on and it looks like nothing is being left in its original condition. Most facilities are presently closed (pools, exercise rooms, etc.) while being rebuilt. The lobby has a presentation of the new look of the guest rooms and they will be beautiful. I look forward to returning someday when all is complete - it will be the best place on the beach (which is fantastic)! TIP: book a family suite in the beach building if you can afford it - lots of extra room, some appliances, and a huge wraparound balcony facing the water.

aka: Four Points By Sheraton Destin- Ft Walton Beach Hotel
description: Four Points Destin-Fort Walton Beach is a tropical retreat on the beautiful beaches of the Emerald Coast. Friendly service and a relaxed setting in the Florida panhandle will ensure a great stay.
